results.description: Uses implied_volatility_call_10 and ts_delta to capture recent ATM call-IV momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied (uses multiple datafields? used 1 to keep signal clean). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector). SUGGESTION3 not applied (coverage 0.6958 > 0.6). SUGGESTION4 considered: field has high userCount (1676). Confidence set to 0.70 because short-term IV momentum is robust around events.

Signal: short-tenor put IV minus call IV indicates demand for downside protection. SUGGESTION1 applied (uses 2 datafields). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage ~0.696). SUGGESTION4: both fields have good userCounts (816, 809). Confidence 0.75 given economic rationale.

Capture steepening: short-term IV minus long-term IV (implied_volatility_call_30 - implied_volatility_call_270). SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). SUGGESTION3 not applied (coverage high). SUGGESTION4 fields have large userCount (1276, 5269). Confidence 0.78 as term structure often predictive.

Compare historical_volatility_30 to implied_volatility_mean_30 to detect mispricing. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). SUGGESTION4: both fields have moderate userCount. Coverage >0.6 so ts_backfill not used. Confidence 0.72 because realized-implied spread is classic alpha.

Cross-sectional zscore of implied_volatility_mean_60 to select high/low IV. SUGGESTION1 minimal (1 field). SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4: userCount 572. Confidence 0.65 due to cross-sectional normalization.
ts_delta on historical_volatility_120 to capture trend in realized vol. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field for focus. SUGGESTION4: high userCount (1384). Coverage >0.6 no backfill. Confidence 0.66.

Curvature proxy: short-term mean IV minus medium-term mean IV (implied_volatility_mean_30 - implied_volatility_mean_90). SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). SUGGESTION4: both have reasonable userCounts. Confidence 0.68.
Implied_volatility_call_60 minus implied_volatility_mean_60 measures call-specific demand. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage ok. SUGGESTION4: good userCounts. Confidence 0.67.

ts_zscore applied to ts_delta(implied_volatility_put_30,5) to reduce outliers. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field, SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4: put_30 userCount 883. Confidence 0.70 because zscore stabilizes signal.

results.idea: Relative IV dispersion (call vs put mean)
results.description: Compare implied_volatility_call_90 to implied_volatility_put_90; high dispersion signals one-sided flows. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both fields have userCount ~1146/1132. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: IV momentum cross-tenor (30d delta vs 90d delta)
results.description: ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_30,5) - ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_90,5) detects short-term shocks. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). Coverage ok. Confidence 0.71.

ts_zscore(ts_delta(implied_volatility_call_720, 30), 60) identifies long-term trend changes. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field; SUGGESTION4: call_720 userCount 1201. Confidence 0.60 due to longer horizon lower signal freq.

Divide implied_volatility_mean_60 by historical_volatility_60 to find implied/realized premium. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). Coverage >0.6 so no backfill. Confidence 0.74 as ratio captures premium.
ts_max_diff(implied_volatility_call_10, 10) measures proximity to recent highs. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.62.
subtract(implied_volatility_mean_10, ts_mean(implied_volatility_mean_30,30)) detects overshoots. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. ts_mean used (operator count small). Confidence 0.73.
ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_skew_30, 5) captures rapid change in skew. SUGGESTION1 used 1 skew field. Coverage ~0.6869 >0.6 so ok. Confidence 0.64.

ts_corr(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_90, 60) identifies when short and medium IV decouple. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. SUGGESTION4: both fields have moderate userCount. Confidence 0.68.
ts_zscore(ts_returns(implied_volatility_call_10, 3), 20) to find short-term reversals. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.61 due to noise.
subtract(implied_volatility_mean_skew_60, implied_volatility_mean_skew_90) to capture curvature in skew. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.63.
zscore(historical_volatility_180) cross-sectionally selects realized vol outliers. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field; SUGGESTION4: historical_volatility_180 userCount high (1631). Confidence 0.66.
subtract(ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_30,5), ts_delta(historical_volatility_30,5)). SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). This contrasts implied and realized moves. Confidence 0.72.
zscore(subtract(implied_volatility_put_30, implied_volatility_call_30)) normalizes cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. SUGGESTION4 both fields active. Confidence 0.71.
divide(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_360), implied_volatility_mean_360) normalizes slope. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Coverage OK. Confidence 0.69.
subtract(implied_volatility_mean_10, implied_volatility_mean_20) to detect sudden short-term runs. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.66.
ts_delta(ts_delta(historical_volatility_60, 10), 5) measures acceleration of realized vol. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.60 due to noise amplification.
ts_rank(implied_volatility_call_30, 90) gives percentile position vs lookback. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.63.
subtract(implied_volatility_put_90, implied_volatility_mean_90) reveals put-specific skew. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: IV volatility of volatility (stddev of IV 30d)
results.description: ts_std_dev(implied_volatility_mean_30, 30) captures IV variability. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.64.
subtract(implied_volatility_call_30, ts_mean(implied_volatility_call_10, 10)) finds call overshoots. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.68.
ts_zscore(subtract(implied_volatility_put_60, ts_mean(implied_volatility_put_60, 30)), 60). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.69.

subtract(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_90), subtract(implied_volatility_mean_90, implied_volatility_mean_270)). Uses 3 fields? To comply with 2-datafield limit, approximate with 30 and 270: subtract(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_270), 0). SUGGESTION1 simplified to 2 fields. Confidence 0.58 (approximation).

results.idea: Implied vs realized volatility momentum gap
results.description: subtract(ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_60, 10), ts_delta(historical_volatility_60, 10)). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.72.
ts_max_diff(implied_volatility_mean_skew_10, 5). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.61.
divide(implied_volatility_call_30, implied_volatility_put_30) captures relative call/put demand. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.66.
ts_ir(implied_volatility_mean_30, 30) measures persistence of IV moves. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.62.
subtract(ts_std_dev(historical_volatility_60, 60), ts_std_dev(implied_volatility_mean_60, 60)). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.59.
ts_rank(implied_volatility_mean_10, 30) captures repeated short-term patterns. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.55.
ts_arg_max(implied_volatility_mean_30, 10) identifies recent peaks timing. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.60.
if_else(greater(implied_volatility_put_60, implied_volatility_call_60), 1, -1) simple directional. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.57.
ts_zscore(divide(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_90), 60) finds convergence/divergence. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.65.
subtract(historical_volatility_120, ts_mean(historical_volatility_120, 120)) to find large realized moves. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Short vs long put skew steepening
results.description: subtract(implied_volatility_put_30, implied_volatility_put_720) indicates short-term demand for puts. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.70.
subtract(implied_volatility_mean_30, ts_mean(implied_volatility_mean_60, 60)). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.68.
zscore(implied_volatility_call_30) cross-sectional normalization. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.64.
ts_zscore(ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_skew_60, 10), 40). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.60.
divide(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_270) measures contango/backwardation in IV. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.67.
divide(subtract(implied_volatility_put_10, implied_volatility_call_10), implied_volatility_mean_10). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.68.
subtract(implied_volatility_mean_30, ts_mean(implied_volatility_mean_30, 30)). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.66.
subtract(historical_volatility_180, implied_volatility_mean_360) finds persistent realized > implied. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.63.
ts_arg_min(implied_volatility_mean_10, 10) finds recent trough timing. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.54.
ts_rank(implied_volatility_put_60, 120) signals sustained high put demand. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: IV shock vs realized shock correlation
results.description: ts_corr(ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_30,5), ts_delta(historical_volatility_30,5), 60). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.61.
ts_delta(ts_delta(implied_volatility_call_60, 10), 5). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.56.
subtract(implied_volatility_mean_30, ts_mean(implied_volatility_mean_30, 30)). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.66.
divide(implied_volatility_mean_skew_10, implied_volatility_mean_skew_60) highlights rapid skew moves. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.59.
ts_quantile(implied_volatility_mean_90, 90) identifies extreme quantiles. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.62.
divide(ts_std_dev(historical_volatility_60, 60), ts_std_dev(implied_volatility_mean_60, 60)). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.57.
if_else(greater(implied_volatility_mean_30, ts_mean(implied_volatility_mean_30,30)), -1, 1) signal to fade extremes. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.68.
subtract(implied_volatility_put_270, implied_volatility_mean_270) indicates elevated put-specific demand. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.70.
ts_kurtosis(implied_volatility_mean_30, 60) measures tail changes in IV distribution. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.50 (kurtosis noisy).
subtract(ts_delta(implied_volatility_call_30,5), ts_delta(implied_volatility_call_720,5)). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.66.
ts_sum(if_else(greater(implied_volatility_put_10, implied_volatility_put_20), 1, 0), 5) approximates recent increases. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.58.
ts_zscore(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_60, historical_volatility_60), 60). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.71.
ts_quantile(implied_volatility_call_60, 60) flags extremes. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.61.
zscore(implied_volatility_mean_skew_90) to pick skew outliers. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.63.
subtract(implied_volatility_mean_270, implied_volatility_mean_30) negative values indicate flattening. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.65.
ts_rank(historical_volatility_30, 90) selects realized volatility outliers. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: IV shock confirmation via correlation drop
results.description: if_else(less(ts_corr(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_90, 30), 0.3), 1, 0) flags decoupling. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.58.
ts_zscore(ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_10, 3), 20) negative extreme indicates compression. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.62.
ts_ir(implied_volatility_put_30, 30) measures persistence of put IV moves. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.63.
subtract(implied_volatility_mean_90, implied_volatility_mean_360) finds short-term elevated IV vs 1y. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Historical vol to IV ratio trend
results.description: ts_zscore(divide(historical_volatility_60, implied_volatility_mean_60), 60). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.69.
greater(ts_delta(implied_volatility_call_30, 1), 0.02) boolean spike (>2% move). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.55 (threshold heuristic).
subtract(implied_volatility_mean_skew_10, implied_volatility_mean_skew_270) for skew term slope. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.60.

ts_arg_max(implied_volatility_mean_30, 20) + ts_arg_min(implied_volatility_mean_30, 20) used heuristically to time reversals; simplified to ts_arg_max. SUGGESTION1 reduced to 1 field for simplicity. Confidence 0.53.
subtract(implied_volatility_put_1080, implied_volatility_mean_1080) finds long-term deviations. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: IV short-term vs long-term volatility regime
results.description: if_else(greater(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_720), 1, -1). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.62.
if_else(less(historical_volatility_30, ts_mean(historical_volatility_120, 120)), 1, -1) identify low realized vol that may rebound. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.61.
subtract(ts_std_dev(implied_volatility_mean_30, 30), ts_std_dev(implied_volatility_mean_90, 30)). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.56.
bucket(ts_rank(implied_volatility_call_30, 90), range="0,1,0.2") to bucket into quintiles. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.59.
subtract(ts_ir(implied_volatility_put_60, 60), ts_ir(implied_volatility_call_60, 60)). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.60.
subtract(implied_volatility_mean_10, historical_volatility_10) highlights implied premium. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.73.
zscore(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_10, ts_mean(implied_volatility_mean_10, 20))). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.68.
subtract(ts_rank(implied_volatility_mean_30, 90), ts_rank(implied_volatility_mean_270, 360)) comparing ranks. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.57.
ts_zscore(subtract(ts_delta(implied_volatility_call_30,5), ts_delta(implied_volatility_put_30,5)), 60). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.66.
subtract(implied_volatility_mean_skew_90, implied_volatility_mean_90) uses 2 fields to proxy tail demand. SUGGESTION1 used both skew and mean. Confidence 0.64.
ts_zscore(subtract(historical_volatility_60, ts_mean(historical_volatility_60, 120)), 120). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Rapid change in IV term slope
results.description: ts_delta(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_90), 5). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.65.
ts_zscore(subtract(implied_volatility_put_30, ts_mean(implied_volatility_put_30,30)), 60). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.67.
divide(implied_volatility_mean_30, ts_mean(implied_volatility_mean_30, 90)). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.61.
ts_sum(if_else(greater(ts_delta(implied_volatility_call_10,1), 0), 1, 0), 5) counts positive moves. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.55.
subtract(implied_volatility_mean_30, ts_delay(implied_volatility_mean_30, 22)) measures month-over-month change. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.63.
subtract(historical_volatility_120, ts_mean(historical_volatility_120, 360)). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.59.
ts_scale(implied_volatility_mean_30, 30) scales within time series. SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.60.
subtract(ts_mean(implied_volatility_put_60, 30), ts_mean(implied_volatility_call_60, 30)). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.67.
ts_product(ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_30,1), 3) approximate rapid product change; simplified as ts_delta. SUGGESTION1 simplified to single ts_delta for clarity. Confidence 0.52.
subtract(ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_skew_30,5), ts_delta(implied_volatility_mean_30,5)). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.60.
ts_zscore(subtract(implied_volatility_mean_360, ts_mean(implied_volatility_mean_360, 360)), 360). SUGGESTION1 used 1 field. Confidence 0.58.
subtract(historical_volatility_30, historical_volatility_60) finds relative realized vol moves. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.55.
if_else(less(implied_volatility_mean_30, implied_volatility_mean_270), 1, -1) simple trade on term reversion. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.56.
